EN: Are you sure you want to delete the node？
Are you sure you want to remove the parent node?
There must be a root node

EN: The root node: {0} can't have a parent node

EN: The node: {0} {1} cannot have child nodes
The file name cannot be empty

EN: The file name is too long and cannot exceed 20 characters

EN: Function description of the composite node

EN: If Node {0} can have a maximum of three child nodes

EN: No parameters can be added, please add parameters

EN: Change the subtree to config file

CN: 参数名只能包含:数字、字母、下划线，且数字不能放在第一个字符位置
EN: The parameter name can contain only digits, letters, and underscores (_), and cannot start with a digit
The field name is read only
Common: child nodes can be edited

CN:
选择节点：依次从头顺次遍历执行所有子节点 

 当前执行节点返回 Success，退出停止，向父节点 

 返回 Success 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出当前节点 

 继续执行下一个节点 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点，向父节 

 点返回 Running，下次执行直接从该节点开始 


 
 如果所有节点都返回Fail，执行完所有节点后 

 向父节点返回 Fail;
EN:
Select node: Execute all child nodes in sequence 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success,exits 

 and stop, returns Success to the parent node 
 

 
 The current execution node returns Fail,exits the

 current node,Proceed to the next node 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, recording 

 the current node, returns Running to the parent node, 

 and the next execution starts from this node 
 

 
 If all nodes return Fail, after all nodes are executed, 

 Return Fail to the parent node

CN:
顺序节点：依次执行子节点 

 当前执行节点返回 Success，就继续执行后续节点 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出停止，向父节点 

 返回 Fail，下次执行直接从第一个节点开始 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点，向父节 

 点返回 Running，下次执行直接从该节点开始 


 
 如果所有节点都返回 Success，向父节点返回 Success
EN:
Sequence node: Executes the child nodes in sequence 
 

 
 If the current executing node returns Success, 

 execute the next node 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Fail, exits and 

 stops, return Fail to the parent node, and the next 

 execution starts from the first node 
 

  
 The current executing node returns Running, 

 recording the current node, returns Running to the 

 parent node, and the next execution starts from this node 
 

 
 If all nodes return Success, return Success to the 

 parent node

CN:
随机顺序节点：(参考顺序节点) 

 每次随机一个未执行的节点，总随机次数为子节点个数 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，继续随机一个未执行的节点 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出停止 

 向父节点返回 Fail 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点 

 向父节点返回 Running，下次执行直接从该节点开始 


 
 如果所有节点都返回 Success 

 向父节点返回 Success
EN:
RandomSequence node :(refer to Sequence node) 

 
 Every time random a unexecuted node and 

 executed the node, the total number of random is the 

 number of child nodes 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success, 

 random a node and execute 
 

 
 The current execution node returns Fail, exits 

 and stop, Return Fail to the parent node 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, 

 recording the current node, Return Running to 

 the parent node, and the next execution starts 

 from that node 
 

 
 If all nodes return Success,Returns Success to 

 the parent node

CN:
随机选择节点：(参考选择节点) 

 每次随机一个未执行的节点，总随机次数为子节点个数 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，退出停止

 向父节点返回 Success 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出当前节点 

 继续随机一个未执行的节点开始执行 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点 

 向父节点返回 Running，下次执行直接从该节点开始 


 
 如果所有节点都返回Fail，执行完所有节点后 

 向父节点返回 Fail;
EN:
Randoml select nodes :(refer to select nodes) 

 Every time random a unexecuted node and executed 

 the node, the total number of random is the number 

 of child nodes 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success, exits and 

 stop, Returns Success to the parent node 
 

 
 The current execution node returns Fail, exits the 

 current node, random a unexecuted node and executed 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, recording 

 the current node, Return Running to the parent node, 

 the next execution starts from that node 
 

 
 If all nodes return Fail, after all nodes are executed 

 Return Fail to the parent node

CN:
随机权重节点：(参考随机选择节点) 

 每次根据节点权重随机一个未执行的节点 

 总随机次数为子节点个数 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，退出停止 

 向父节点返回 Success 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出当前节点 

 继续随机一个未执行的节点开始执行 


 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点 

 向父节点返回 Running 

 下次执行直接从该节点开始 


 
 如果所有节点都返回Fail，执行完所有节点后 

 向父节点返回 Fail;
EN:
Random Priority node :(refer to random select node) 
 

 
 Random one unexecuted node based on node priority 

 The total random number is the number of children 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success, exits 

 and stop, Returns Success to the parent node 
 

 
 The current execution node returns Fail, exits the 

 current node, random an unexecuted node and executing 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, recording 

 the current node, Return Running to the parent node, 

 The next execution starts from this node 
 
 
 
 If all nodes return Fail, after all nodes are executed, 

 Return Fail to the parent node;

CN:
并行选择节点：依次从头顺次遍历执行所有子节点 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，退出停止，向父节点 
 
 返回 Success 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点，继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，记录所有返回 Running 的节点 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，继续执行下一个节点 

 
 
 如果没有节点返回 Success， 
 
 如果 Running 的节点数大于 0 向父节点返回 Running 
 
 否则向父节点返回 Fail 
;
EN:
Parallel Select node: execute all child nodes in sequence 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success, exits and 

  stop Return Success to the parent node 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, records 

 the current node, and execute the next node, 

  record all nodes that return Running 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Fail, execute the next node 

 
 If no node returns Success, Return Running to the parent node 

 if the number of Running nodes is greater than 0 

 Otherwise returned Fail to the parent node

CN:
并行执行所有节点：依次从头顺次遍历执行所有子节点 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Success、 Fail、Running 都继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，分别记录返回三种结果的节点个数 

 
 
 执行完所有节点后 
 
 如果所有节点都返回 Success 向父节点返回 Success 
 
 如果所有节点都返回 Fail 向父节点返回 Fail 
 
 否则一定有节点返回了Running 向父节点返回 Running 
;
EN:
Parallel All node: Execute all child nodes in sequence 
 

 
 The current execution node returns Success, Fail, or 

 Running, Execute the next node, record the number 

 of nodes that return three results 
 

 
 After all nodes are executed 

 Return Success to the parent node if all nodes return 

  Success 
 

 
 Return Fail to the parent node if all nodes return Fail 
 

 
 Otherwise, some node must return Running, return 

 Running to the parent node

CN:
并行节点：依次从头顺次遍历执行所有子节点 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出停止，向父节点 
 
 返回 Fail 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，记录当前节点，继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，记录所有返回 Success 的节点

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点，继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，记录所有返回 Running 的节点 

 
 
 如果没有节点返回 Fail， 
 
 如果所有节点都返回 Success 向父节点返回 Success 
 
 否则向父节点返回 Running 
;
EN:
Parallel node: Execute all child nodes in sequence 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Fail, exits and stops, 

 Return Fail to the parent node 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Success, records 

 the current node, and executing the next node, record 

 all nodes that return Success 
 

 
 The current executing node returns Running, records the 

 current node, executing the next node and record all 

 nodes that return Running 
 

 
 If no node returns Fail, 

 Return Success to the parent node if all nodes return Success 

 Return Fail to the parent node if at least one node returns Fail 
 

 
 Otherwise, returned Running to the parent node

CN:
并行节点：依次从头顺次遍历执行所有子节点 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Fail，退出停止，向父节点 
 
 返回 Fail 

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Success，记录当前节点，继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，记录所有返回 Success 的节点

 
 
 当前执行节点返回 Running, 记录当前节点，继续 
 
 执行下一个节点，记录所有返回 Running 的节点 

 
 
 如果没有节点返回 Fail， 
 
 如果所有节点都返回 Success 向父节点返回 Success 
 
 否则向父节点返回 Running 
;
EN:
If Judge Sequence node: 
 

 
 You can only have two or three children 

 The first is that only Success and Fail are returned 
 

 
 if the second or third nodes return RUNNING last time, 

 this time, the node that returned running is executing again 
 

 
 If not, executed the first node, based on the first node 

 Results Success or Fail, the second and third nodes 

 are selected to execute;

CN:
if判断并行节点：\n 
 只能有 二或者三个子节点\n 
 第一个为判断节点只能返回Success、Fail \n\n 
 
 因为是并行节点，每次执行都会先执行第一个节点\n 
 根据第一个节点返回结果选择执行第二个、第三个节点 \n\n 
 
 如果上次执行的是第二、三个节点中的某一个 \n 
 当前要执行的节点跟上次相同，则会直接执行 Execute \n 
 如果当前要执行的节点跟上次不同，则会执行上次节点 \n 
 OnExit , 新节点则走 OnEnter、Execute;
EN:
If Judge Parallel node: 

 
 You can only have two or three children 

 The first is that only Success and Fail are returned 
 

 
 the first node is executed first with each execution, 

 Execute the second or third nodes based on the 

  results of the first node 
 

 
 If the second or third nodes to be executed is the 

  same as the previous one, call the Execute method 
 
 on this node 
 

 
 If the second or third nodes to be executed is 

  different from the last one, call the OnExit method 
 
 of the previous node, call the OnEnter and Execute 
 
 methods of the new node

CN:
修饰_直到Success：\n 
 执行节点 \n 
 如果节点返回结果不是 Success \n 
 向父节点返回 Running \n\n 
 
 直到节点返回 Success，向父节点返回 Success
EN:
Decorator Until Success node: 
 

 
 executing the node 

 If the node returns a result other than Success 
 
 Return Running to the parent node 
 

 
 Success is returned to the parent node until the node 

 returns Success

CN:
修饰_直到Fail：\n 
 执行节点 \n 
 如果节点返回结果不是 Fail \n 
 向父节点返回 Running \n\n 
 
 直到节点返回 Fail，向父节点返回 Success
EN:
Decorator Until Fail node: 
 

 
 executing the node 

 If the node returns a result other than Fail 
 
 Return Running to the parent node 
 

 
 Success is returned to the parent node until the node 

 returns Fail

CN:
修饰_返回Success：
 
 执行节点，无论节点返回 Success、Fail、Running 
 
 执行结束后永远向父节点返回 Success
EN:
Decorator Return Success node: 
 

 
 Execute the node, whether the node returns Success, Fail, or Running 

 , Fail, or Running Success is always returned to the 

 parent node after execution

CN:
修饰_返回Fail：
 
 执行节点，无论节点返回 Success、Fail、Running 
 
 执行结束后永远向父节点返回 Fail
EN:
Decorator Return Fail node: 
 

 
 Execute the node, whether the node returns Success 

 , Fail, or Running Fail is always returned to the 
 
 parent node after execution

CN:
修饰节点_重复: 
 
 开始执行该节点时，将记录次数清零 
 
 顺序执行所有子节点(记为 1 次)，不关心节点返回结果 

 
 如果 执行次数 < 配置执行次数 向父节点返回 Running 
 
 如果 执行次数 >= 配置执行次数 向父节点返回 Success
EN:
Decorator Repeat node: 
 

 
 When the node is started, the number of records is 

 cleared to zero 
 

 
 Execute all child nodes in sequence, record execution times 
 

 
 If the number of executions < the Configure number, 

 return Running to the parent node 
 

 
 If the number of executions >=the Configure number, 

 return Success to the parent node

CN: 取反修饰节点 Inverter 对子节点执行结果取反
EN:
Decorator Inverter node: 
 

 
 reversed the result of executing the child node
